title: Himi 38
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
’Oku fuonounou
‘Etau mo’ui ni,
Pea fonu ia foki
‘I he ‘ahi’ahi.
2.
He ko hotau sino
Ko e me’a vaivai,
Hoko hono tupu’anga
Ko e kelekele.
3.
Pea ka pekia
‘A hotau sino ni
‘E ‘alu mei ai leva
‘A e laumālie.
4.
’E ‘alu ‘o lelei
‘A e angatonu,
Kae ‘alu ki he kovi
‘A e angahala.
5.
Ke tau manavahē
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Pea ke tau teuteu atu
Ki he ‘etau mate. *
